text: bhīṣaṇiyuṇṭākkikkeāṇṭuṁ, allāhuvinṟe mārgattil ninn atil viśvasiccavare taṭaññukeāṇṭuṁ at (ā mārgaṁ) vakramāyirikkān āgrahiccukeāṇṭuṁ niṅṅaḷ pātakaḷilellāṁ irikkukayuṁ arut‌. niṅṅaḷ eṇṇattil kuṟavāyirunniṭṭuṁ niṅṅaḷkk avan vard'dhanav nalkiyat ōrkkukayuṁ nāśakārikaḷuṭe paryavasānaṁ eṅṅaneyāyirunnuvenn nēākkukayuṁ ceyyuka
